column4: Is there a way to upgrade firefox to 1.5.0.6?  I found where it is /usb/lib/firefox... but there's symbolic links, which I don't how or if I should maintain them.
you can probably download it from mozillas homepage. I havent done it thou, I am using 1.5.0.5.
I've downloaded it... I have it extracted, but I just wanted to replace my old one.  I guess I could just wait till ubuntu's repositories get updated.
ok. Sorry I dont know how, but search the forum, maybe theres a guide there?
